results.title: Introduction to the cathode ray oscilloscope
results.creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Thomas Smith
results.brief_description: Illustrates the basic principles of the cathode-ray oscilloscope and its versatility as a tool in science and technology. Demonstrates the principles of transducer and their application through the use of the cathode ray oscilloscope.
results.description: Illustrates the basic principles of the cathode-ray oscilloscope and its versatility as a tool in science and technology. Demonstrates the principles of transducer and their application through the use of the cathode ray oscilloscope.

results.title: Introduction to sound
results.brief_description: Gives examples of the diferent types of sound explaining how all such sounds are produced by a vibrating source. Explains the meaning of the terms oscillation, amplitude and frequency. Animated diagrams are used to show how the human vocal mechanism functions and models are used to demonstrate and explain the functioning of the human ear.

results.title: Introduction to reaction kinetics
results.brief_description: Illustrates by animation the mechanisms of some simple chemical reactions. Explains the effect of temperature, activation energy, geometry of collision, and catalysis upon the rate of reaction.

results.title: Introduction to prestressed concrete
results.brief_description: Prestressing, by the introduction of steel bars or cables under high tension into liquid concrete, has revolutionised concrete construction. Shows the difference between pre-tensioning and post-tensioning, and production techniques in the factory and on the site.
results.description: Prestressing, by the introduction of steel bars or cables under high tension into liquid concrete, has revolutionised concrete construction. Shows the difference between pre-tensioning and post-tensioning, and production techniques in the factory and on the site.

results.title: Introduction to physics
results.brief_description: Shows a narrator describing various aspects of physics including the main divisions of the subject, the distinguishing features of each division, and the everyday application of the principles of physics.

results.title: Introduction to movement education (TEFC)
results.brief_description: Illustrates the enthusiastic reaction of children to the problem-solving approach to gymnastics. Explains movement language, teaching methods, and safety aspects. Presents movement education as a throught-provoking philosophy and an area of physical education catering for all levels of performance. Suitable for teacher tertiary levels.

results.title: Introduction to Microwave Cookery
results.brief_description: Virginia Hill presents a videotape that will take the mystery out of microwave cooking. Microwave cooking is easy, nutritious and fun when you know how. This tape takes the viewer through a step-by-step guide to the microwave oven and its effective use.
